sentence: Fox News' Tucker Carlson has all but declared eternal fealty to the Motherland, and Trumpian Mini-Me's like Madison Cawthorn and Marjorie Taylor Greene have decided to give plenty of aid and comfort to their longtime war-criminal crush, but the problem actually runs deeper than that.
title: Missouri radio station continues to air literal Russian war propaganda

sentence: Fox News host and former GOP politician Trey Gowdy has asked Rep. Madison Cawthorn to reveal who in DC's elite did drugs in front of him and invited him to sex parties or admit that he was lying.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Fox News host says Madison Cawthorn needs to name those involved in orgies and drugs, or admit to making up stories about DC's elite

sentence: However, WND already has reported on a federal judge's rejection of virtually the same allegations in a case involving Rep. Madison Cawthorn, a Republican from North Carolina.
author: Bob Unruh
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene warns Dems of 'another way to play this game'

sentence: The first source of pain is freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), who has come under fire from Republican colleagues in recent weeks after making controversial comments.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Campaign Report  GOP jockeying ramps up in Senate primaries

sentence: In contrast, the group's legal action against Greene has taken a different course from its lawsuit against North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who also faces a Republican primary in mid-May.
author: Steven Rosenfeld
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Facing Questions Under Oath Over January 6 Role, by Steven Rosenfeld

sentence: If Madison Were Omar To the Editor: Re Police Accuse Lawmaker of Trying to Fly With Gun? (news article, April 27), about Representative Madison Cawthorn trying to bring a gun through airport security: Instead of this ultraright white man, imagine this story being about another professional American man, this one with swarthy skin and named Omar, who was twice caught trying to bring a loaded gun onto a commercial flight.
title: Tucker Carlson's Influence on America and Its Media
The Susan Collinsest Susan Collins That Ever Susan Collinsed
